About Our Work

This is a semantic layout to showcase best practices with CSS, HTML, Accessibility, and vanilla Javascript.

Accessibility
Standards

When websites and web tools are properly designed and coded, people with disabilities can use them.

  • Auditory
  • Cognitive
  • Neurological
  • Physical

CSS
Thinking

When websites and web tools are properly designed and coded, people with disabilities can use them.

  • Greatness
  • Awesomeness
  • Coolness

No
React?

When websites and web tools are properly designed and coded, people with disabilities can use them. However, currently many sites and tools are developed with accessibility barriers that make them difficult or impossible for some people to use.

  • Auditory
  • Cognitive
  • Neurological
  • Physical
